item.title: Munis Rise as Bonds Rally on Job Data Cementing Rate-Cut Bets

review.headline_rewrite: Munis Rise as Bonds Rally on Job Data Cementing Rate-Cut Bets
bullets: Yields on top-rated state and local government debt fell alongside those on Treasuries.
The weaker-than-expected data cemented bets the Fed will cut resume easing monetary policy this month, ending a pause that’s kept its benchmark overnight rate
“Investors are looking to lock in the relatively higher yields ahead of the policy easing.” Investors now see a quarter-point rate cut at the
16-17 policy gathering as a sure thing and anticipate a total of three such cuts this year, according to futures contracts.
